Instruction: Wash and peel the sweet potatoes, then cut them into large chunks.
Place the sweet potato chunks in a large pot.
Add water to the pot until the sweet potatoes are fully submerged.
Bring the water to a boil over high heat.
Reduce the heat to medium and let the sweet potatoes simmer for 20-25 minutes, or until they are tender when pierced with a fork.
Drain the water from the pot.
Serve the sweet potatoes immediately or use them in your favorite recipe.
